mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ARTICLE (ARTICLE_NUM, ARTICLE_AUTHOR, ARTICLE_TITLE, ARTICLE_CONTENT, ARTICLE_DATE,MEMBER_NUM) VALUES (ARTICLE_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{articleAuthor}, #{articleTitle},#{articleContent} ,SYSDATE,#{memberNum})
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NUM ,ARTICLE_AUTHOR, ARTICLE_TITLE, ARTICLE_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(ARTICLE_DATE, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') ARTICLE_DATE,ARTICLE_NUM FROM ARTICLE ORDER BY ARTICLE_NUM DESC
